Name: The Most Boring Life Ever 2 - Work From Home
About the game: Another boring game! We are excited to present the next entry into the Most Boring Series! Do you miss life pre covid? The fantastic yet boring 9-5 of our existence? Then this is NOT the game for you. This boring game involves you moving around throughout the day during quarantine as you go by living life with no end in sight with covid in this endless experience. Think this is going to be a fun game? NOPE. Enjoy the new normal with covid where you will wonder if things will ever get back to normal.
